name: International Conference on Machines, Computing and Management Technologies
content: ICMCMT 2021 2021 International Conference on Machines, Computing and Management Technologies (ICMCMT 2021) aims to bring together leading academic scientists, researchers, industry representatives, postdoctoral fellows and research scholars around the world to share their knowledge and research expertise, to advances in the areas of Mechanical, Computing and Medical. This Conference is an international forum for researchers, scientists, and professionals from both academia and industry to exchange up-to-date knowledge and experience in different fields of computer science, Management, Medical, information and communication technology to discuss and exchange information and knowledge in their areas of interest.
